dentist.translation[0].definitions[0].de: someone whose job is to treat people’s teeth
dentist.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: I’m going to the dentist this afternoon.
dentist.translation[0].note_box[0].secti: someone whose job is to treat people’s teeth
I’ve made an appointment with the dentist.
She always dreaded a visit to the dentist.
a dentist who has special training to operate on people’s teeth
a dentist who makes teeth straight when they have not been growing correctly
someone who is specially trained to help a dentist by cleaning teeth and giving advice about how to keep teeth healthy
Ask your dental hygienist for advice on using floss.
